Waltham.Robinson-Lewis-G. F. Fessenden House: The Robinson-Lewis-G. F. Fessenden House is a historic house at 40 Westminster Avenue in Arlington, Massachusetts. The 2-1/2 story wood frame house was built c. 1850, and is a well-preserved Italianate style house, with ornate bracketed window surrounds, and a gable-roofed front porch with dentil moulding and full pediment.
